abilityEffect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a [W] Energy card from your Active Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. This power can't be used if Kingdra is affected by a Special Condition.

effect.en: Flip a coin. If heads, discard 1 Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon, if any.
